Clear clutter, clear mind: Feng Shui tip #1 - Declutter your space for a decluttered life!
Water features bring flow: Add a small fountain to your home office for increased productivity.
Mirror, mirror on the wall: Place mirrors strategically to expand your space and reflect positive energy.
Plant power: Introduce some green friends to purify air and boost your mood. Feng Shui approved!
Color your world: Use calming blues in bedrooms, energizing reds in dining areas. Balance is key!
Light it up: Ensure good lighting in all corners to banish negative energy and illuminate your path to success.
